casebody.data:
Debra BATTON-JAJUGA, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
FARM BUREAU GENERAL INSURANCE COMPANY OF MICHIGAN, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157145
COA: 334130 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 21, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
